info.name: Twitter - Dark n Simple
info.description:
Changes the Twitter to a nice dark grey or grey to make it easy for the eyes. If you've found a bug, just Tweet me. Want to upload your own images to "Background Image" and "New Layout Banner Image"?
To change the background images upload an image to Twitter (HAS TO BE TWITTER). And copy the image url into "enter url".

data.title: Wow this works great. Nice job
